TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DrawItemEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `DrawItem`事件由所有者绘制控件（如 和控件）引发 。The `DrawItem` event is raised by owner draw controls, such as the and controls. 它包含用户绘制指定项所需的所有信息，包括项索引、 和 应在其上完成绘制的。It contains all the information that is needed for the user to paint the specified item, including the item index, the , and the on which the drawing should be done. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建所有者描述的 项。The following example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn items. 该代码使用 属性来指定所绘制的项是固定大小的，以及 用于执行每个项到中的绘制的事件 。The code uses the property to specify that the items drawn are fixed sized and the event to perform the drawing of each item into the . 示例代码使用 作为参数传递给事件处理程序的类的属性和方法来绘制项。The example code uses the properties and methods of the class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items. 此示例假设已将一个 名为的控件 `listBox1` 添加到窗体，该 事件由示例代码中定义的事件处理程序进行处理。This example assumes that a control that is named `listBox1` has been added to a form and that the event is handled by the event handler defined in the example code. 该示例还假定已 使用文本 "Apple"、"橙色" 和 "Plum" 将项添加到中。The example also assumes that items have been added to the with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum" in that order. [!code-csharp[ListBox.DrawMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.DrawMode/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListBox.DrawMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.DrawMode/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建所有者描述的 项。The following example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn items. 该代码使用 属性来指定所绘制的项是固定大小的，以及 用于执行每个项到中的绘制的事件 。The code uses the property to specify that the items drawn are fixed sized and the event to perform the drawing of each item into the . 示例代码使用 作为参数传递给事件处理程序的类的属性和方法来绘制项。The example code uses the properties and methods of the class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items. 此示例假设已将一个 名为的控件 `listBox1` 添加到窗体，该 事件由示例代码中定义的事件处理程序进行处理。This example assumes that a control that is named `listBox1` has been added to a form and that the event is handled by the event handler defined in the example code. 该示例还假定已 使用文本 "Apple"、"橙色" 和 "Plum" 将项添加到中。The example also assumes that items have been added to the with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum" in that order. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果正在绘制的项为 ，则会绘制背景，并突出显示文本。If the item being drawn is , the background is drawn with the text highlighted. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建所有者描述的 项。The following example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn items. 该代码使用 属性来指定所绘制的项为固定大小，并指定 执行每个项到中的绘制的事件 。The code uses the property to specify that the items drawn are a fixed size and the event to perform the drawing of each item into the . 示例代码使用 作为参数传递给事件处理程序的类的属性和方法来绘制项。The example code uses the properties and methods of the class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items. 此示例假设已将 名为的控件 `listBox1` 添加到窗体，并且该 事件由示例代码中定义的事件处理程序进行处理。This example assumes that a control named `listBox1` was added to a form and that the event is handled by the event handler that is defined in the example code. 该示例还假定已将项添加到中，并按顺序将项添加到了 文本 "Apple"、"橙色" 和 "Plum"。The example also assumes that items were added to the with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum", in that order.
